IOUPSD(8) System Manager's Manual IOUPSD(8)

NAME

ioupsd — daemon to track UPS state

DESCRIPTION

ioupsd monitors UPS's. PowerManagement's configd plugin automatically launches ioupsd whenever a UPS is connected to the system. Most HID-compliant USB UPS's are supported at a basic level by OS X; further support must be provided by manufacturers. If a UPS is unsupported, OS X will not automatically launch ioupsd.

LOCATION

/usr/libexec/ioupsd

SEE ALSO

pmset(1), upsshutdown(8)

October 25, 2005 Darwin
